about_the_game:
In the face of a catastrophic event onboard a space capsule, you find yourself devoid of the critical knowledge required to restore the malfunctioning systems. The key to resolving this dire situation lies in collaborating with the ground control team. Together, you must navigate a series of puzzles, working in unison to guarantee the safe return of the capsule to Earth. Communication Breakdown is an immersive asymmetrical VR experience that challenges you to rely solely on verbal communication as you overcome obstacles and strive for success in this high-stakes mission.



In this intense challenge, your problem-solving abilities and teamwork will be pushed to the limit. As the altimeter ticks away, you must land the shuttle with lightning-fast reflexes, relying on clear, efficient communication to avert disaster. Can you beat the clock and emerge as the heroes of the cosmos?

Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping race against time where every decision and word counts. Get ready to tackle mind-bending puzzles and communicate your way to victory.

The space ship manual is your lifeline, providing the vital information you need to succeed. Gather your crew, buckle up, and embark on an unforgettable cosmic voyage!

VR Exclusive game

Features

  • Immerse yourself in a Space Survival VR game where you take on the role of a passenger tasked with landing a space capsule.

  • Engage in asymmetrical gameplay, combining VR and external manual players.

  • Connect with your friends and invite at least one external player to join you either on Discord or play alongside you.

  • Solve a variety of puzzles and challenges as you navigate through the game.

  • Experience the thrill of surviving in space, making critical decisions that will impact your journey.

  • Engage in intense moments of debate and argumentation with your friends as you face challenging scenarios.

  • Immerse yourself in a unique and interactive space exploration adventure.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Rift S; Quest 2
